# üöó **Rental Mobil ‚Äî Laravel + Filament Admin Dashboard**

![Laravel](https://img.shields.io/badge/Laravel-11.x-FF2D20?style=for-the-badge&logo=laravel&logoColor=white)
![Filament](https://img.shields.io/badge/Filament-3.x-6C63FF?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
![TailwindCSS](https://img.shields.io/badge/TailwindCSS-3.x-06B6D4?style=for-the-badge&logo=tailwindcss&logoColor=white)
![MySQL](https://img.shields.io/badge/MySQL-Database-00758F?style=for-the-badge&logo=mysql&logoColor=white)
![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge)

A **modern car rental management system** built with **Laravel 11**, powered by a **Filament 3 Admin Dashboard**, and designed using **TailwindCSS** for a clean and responsive UI.

</div>

---

## üåü **Features**

‚úÖ User & Admin Authentication  
‚úÖ Filament Dashboard  
‚úÖ Car CRUD Management  
‚úÖ Booking System (User & Admin Side)  
‚úÖ Financial Report (Export PDF / CSV)  
‚úÖ Dark / Light Mode Filament Theme  
‚úÖ Responsive UI (TailwindCSS 3)  

---

## üèóÔ∏è **Tech Stack**

| Layer | Technology |
|-------|-------------|
| **Frontend** | Tailwind CSS + Blade |
| **Backend** | Laravel 11 |
| **Admin Dashboard** | Filament v3 |
| **Database** | MySQL |
| **Testing** | Pest PHP |
| **Deployment** | Laravel Artisan / VPS / GitHub Pages |

---

## üß≠ **Folder Structure Overview**

```bash
rental-mobil/
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Filament/              # Admin Pages & Resources
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Http/Controllers/      # App Controllers
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Models/                # Database Models
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ database/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ migrations/            # Migration Files
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ seeders/               # Data Seeder Files
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public/                    # Public Assets
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ resources/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ views/                 # Blade Templates
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ css/                   # Tailwind Styles
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ js/                    # Optional JS
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ routes/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ web.php                # Web Routes
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ api.php                # API Routes
‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ tests/                     # PestPHP Tests

## ‚öôÔ∏è **Installation Guide**

# 1Ô∏è‚É£ Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/161-Arfin/rental-mobil.git
cd rental-mobil

# 2Ô∏è‚É£ Install dependencies
composer install
npm install && npm run build

# 3Ô∏è‚É£ Set up environment
cp .env.example .env
php artisan key:generate

# 4Ô∏è‚É£ Configure database
# Update DB credentials inside .env file

# 5Ô∏è‚É£ Run migrations & seeders
php artisan migrate --seed

# 6Ô∏è‚É£ Serve the application
php artisan serve
